example.text: Worst of all, this resolution attacks a great defender of democracy, a Member who is among our best. There is a legitimate role for censure in this institution, but the majority has debased it and rendered it meaningless in a cheap partisan slap.
You can read more about the investments coming to our district here . $400 million for the Golden Gate Bridge The Golden Gate Bridge also got a boost from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.

This newsletter is a snapshot of what we've accomplished in the first 100 days, including protecting our region from the effects of climate change, delivering federal storm relief, and standing up to the ever-present threat of gun violence. I look forward to building on this progress - with your help - in the year ahead.

Congress must act now to end the national shame of gun violence which claims more than 100 American lives every day. That is why I support the reinstatement of an assault weapons ban , and recently joined my colleagues on the steps of the Capitol to advocate for commonsense gun violence prevention policies.
